choices: other (im watching this branch... aways watching)
1.content:
okay choose the way Alex expands
some other rules
don't make him grow taller unless it is that choice
if it is a magic cause of gain i prefer that it is slow but if you prefer it quick then branch it off
keep Alex in character
and avoid gay content, i am not homophobic, it is just i don't want it in my story
and for heavens sake's if there is an other choice don't make it go on for all eternity. just make one chapter a different choice
avoid using becoming a sumo as a choice because i have seen it in other stories and i think it is unoriginal and a lazy reason to gain
and for height gain have his proportions the same as best you can
have at least a paragraph unless it is a choice
have good grammar, spelling and let the story flow
1.title: lets begin...

11.title: fat gain

111.content: this is just to get the ball rolling
111.title: some more choices

choices: the end of the month (two more weeks pass)
cast comes off ( 3 months after injury)
11112.content:
It was like any other football game for Alex until he tried to kick the ball. He completely missed the ball and severely twisted his ankle.
He was rushed to the hospital and the Doctor came in with a grim face.
"you will need a cast and need to stay off your feet if it is to heal. You fractured several bones in your ankle"

Alex was heart broken. He lay on the couch sullenly for the first week.

As the second week rolled around, boredom hit like a tonne of bricks. He decided to watch movies, tv, play video games, read books. Just anything to pass the time. He also began to snack more mainly absent minded.

With the lack of physical activity and increase in calories Alex's physique will take a hit.
11112.title: injury (no activity for a while)

111121.content:
Alex continued to snack and it started to become apparent during the third week.
His abs while still noticeable were fading under a thin layer of flab. And his firm ass was more saggy. He didn't notice this changes as they were minor and he also was distracted with eating and his boredom.

With the fourth week passed things were more apparent. Of his sixpack was still visible in a certain light. His face started to soften, his arms, thighs, and chest are more fleshed out. And his butt sticks out more.

Alex stop wearing a belt as his body pushes against his clothes
111121.title: the end of the month (two more weeks pass)

choices: hungry pretty much all the time...
11211.content: Alex rider was walking home one day and while walking he accidentally tripped an old woman. he helped the crone up but she was quite furious of what happened that she muttered something under her breath that Alex didn't understand. once finished the old lady left with Alex feeling odd all over...
11211.title: the old hags (slow) curse

112111.content: when Alex got home the feeling still lingered so he decided just to hang out in his room. two hours later it was dinner time, he went downstairs and notice something was different but put it out of his head. later he got changed for bed and finally noticed something was off about his physique...
112111.title: gradual weight gain

1121111.content: he notice quite a thin layer of fat forming on his normally trim and athletic midsection he was concerned of the cause of it but to tired to continue to think about it...
1121111.title: investigate it

choices: he likes the gain but keeps it to himself for now
he doesn't like the gain, keeps it to himself and tries to find a cure
11211111.content: Alex manage to forget his minimal weight gain but remembered very early in the morning which caused him to awake with a startle. he went to his mirror to find that he his midsection is softer then the night before he found himself in disbelief and decided to weigh himself remembering that he weight around 145 pounds. he stepped on his personal bathroom scale and found he weight 148 pounds he found it impossible for him to gain three pounds in a 24 hour time period as he didn't even eat a lot yesterday he decided to further his investigation of his body, he soon found that it isn't just his stomach growing his arms are just ever so slightly flabbily then he last remember, his butt once firm and small felt every so slightly larger with a hint of cushioning, his once firm pectorals have a hint of flabbiness, he looked at his face and notice that his cheeks are a tiny bit fuller. Alex backed away from his mirror lost in thought while his body ever so slowly gain weight.
11211111.title: early in the morning

112111111.content: he likes the gain but he is uncertain of what other people might think so decided to just hid it as best as he can. later that day he decided to take a walk and he manages to find the old hag. he asked the woman to every so slightly increase the amount of weight gain but have other people think of it as natural and start from where he started so then he can fully enjoy it(at home in his room). the woman agrees and cast a spell on him, Alex felt a gentle tingle in his body as he felt his trim body return. the hag said to Alex that the curse will start again on its own once he is in his room. Alex thanked the crone as he hurried home. once home he started to strip off his shirt stood in front of his mirror. he heard the voice of the hag asking if he is ready in his head and he simply thought the word yes. he felt a surge of energy in his body he looked in the mirror to see his trim stomach softening with a good pinchable layer of fat forming. he turned to see his sides growing a good inch and a half lovehandles. he felt his blue jeans getting tighter as each moment passed, Alex struggled to remove his jeans as his butt was so soft that when he sits it raise him a good half inch. Alex looked at his face to see that it have lost almost all angularity. he stepped on the scale it now says...
112111111.title: he likes the gain but keeps it to himself for now

info.brief_description: my first piece, Alex expands in several ways
info.description:
my first story, you can expand alex rider in many ways. this was originally just going to be just weight gain but decided to add others
some ground rules
only alex can expand
i am going to have inflation for the people who like that
no vore, gore, killing or sex just keep it clean
